Reference version 0.2.6

Package

alfresco

alfresco: R functions for ALFRESCO wildfire model.

Default options

alfdef

Common default values

Stock fire events processing

pp_fire_events

Prepare list of data frames during ALFRESCO post-processing

pp_df_prep

Prepare data frame during ALFRESCO post-processing

pp_fsv pp_fsv_emp pp_fsv_save

Fire size by vegetation ALFRESCO post-processing

prep_fire_events prep_fire_events_emp

ALFRESCO post-processing of fire events

fire_scar_brick

Prepare fire scar bricks

prep_points

Prepare points matrix and locations vector

frp_maps_no_buffer

Make stock FRP maps

General data extraction

run_alf_extraction

Run ALFRESCO data extraction

extract_alf prep_alf_files extract_fsv extract_av

Extract ALFRESCO data

get_domain_cells

Load cell index data frame for subregions

get_veg_labels

Get vegetation labels

get_out_dirs

Get ALFRESCO output directories

alf_extract_slurm

Slurm script for ALFRESCO data extractions

alf_extract_rscript

R script for ALFRESCO data extraction

alf_prep_slurm

Slurm script for ALFRESCO probability distributions

alf_prep_rscript

R script for ALFRESCO probability distributions

extract_alf_stops prep_alf_stops

ALFRESCO extraction stop error checks

plot_map_zoom

Plot map composition for radial buffer around a point

Extracted data curation

alf_dist

Compute probability distribution tables

alf_dist_inputs

Table inputs from extracted data

extract_alf_stops prep_alf_stops

ALFRESCO extraction stop error checks

fsv

Compute fire size by vegetation class

fsdf

Fire size and cumulative burn data frame

cbdf

Cumulative burn over time data frame

Historical fire data

fire_perimeters

Obtain Alaska fire perimeter data

Fire point probability

point_probs

Fire probabilities for point locations

fire_probs

Fire point probabilities

fire_weights

Fire probability weights for point locations

Fire management options

ba_ratios

Obtain total cumulative burn area ratios

save_fmo_ratios

Save FMO ratios maps

save_fmo_panel

Save FMO panel plot

fmo_cb_reduction

FMO cumulative burn reduction table

ba_fmo

Burn area by FMO zone

File system data organization

outputs_as_inputs

Copy ALFRESCO output maps

copy_alf_outputs

Generate bash script for copying ALFRESCO maps

Projections

wgs2ak

Convert from WGS84 to Alaska Albers projection

Command line helpers

prep_comArgs

Prepare command line arguments

prep_alf_frp

Helper function for FRP processing

Data

obs_fmo_ba

Historical Alaska annual burn area by fire management options zones (FMOs).
